title: Backstage Betrayal
intro: Opening night of the school play: excitement, nerves, and ambition. Moments before the curtain rises, the lead actor collapses in the dressing room. Who sabotaged the performance?
clues: The costume was slightly cut in the seams.
The understudy was seen lingering near the dressing room suspiciously.
A prop sword had been swapped for a sharper version.
A note in the director’s handwriting threatens failure if the actor performs.
The Stage Manager’s fingerprints are on the swapped prop sword.
